comment: AWESOME EVERLASTING UNCHANGING TRUTH ... as you receive the Body & Blood of Jesus Christ at Holy Mass today believe & know that you receive the VERY SAME LORD whose BODY was washed in the Jordan river by John . He is still damp with river water as He feeds you & gives you strength .
